Sentencas: Acceptor-doped cerium oxides are a promising solid electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) due to their exceptionally high oxygen ion conductivity.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: Typical solid electrolytes are polycrystalline with a number of grain boundaries, and it is common for grain boundaries to block the motion of mobile oxygen ions as they migrate from one grain to the next.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: Accordingly, it is important precisely to measure the grain boundary conductivities of doped cerium oxides, particularly at the temperature of relevance (>500 degrees C).
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: Here, we undertake a quantitative analysis of the transport properties of singly and doubly doped cerium oxides.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: So that we may precisely extract the grain boundary contribution out of the total conductivity at an elevated temperature (>500 degrees C), both epitaxial and polycrystalline thin films of the oxides are grown via pulsed layer deposition (PLD) on two different insulating, single-crystal substrates: Al2O3(0001) and SiO2(001), and these are then characterized by a range of analysis tools, in this case TEM, SEM, XRD, ICP-MS and AFM.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: These samples with controlled microstructures, in combination with in-plane ionic conductivity measurements by impedance spectroscopy as a function of the thickness, temperature and pO(2), enable us precisely to measure the grain boundary conductivity of the doped ceria at temperatures ranging from 620 to 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature

Sentencas: The impact of the number and type of dopants on the transport properties are also explored.
Titulo: Analysis of the grain boundary conductivity of singly and doubly doped CeO2 thin films at elevated temperature
